name: Dungeon Drafters + Original Soundtrack
description:
Get the Dungeon Drafters game and Original Soundtrack at 15% off!

The Dungeon Drafters soundtrack is a gem crafted with passion, offering a chiptune-style sound that perfectly captures the essence of the game.

The music strikes a perfect balance with combat and exploration tracks, creating a thrilling and upbeat atmosphere throughout. With 76 tracks spread over two discs, the album is a testament to the talented composers who created it. Whether you're a hardcore gamer or simply love great music, this soundtrack is sure to impress with its masterful sound and immersive experience.
